about_the_game:
Awaken in the Third, a mysterious world filled with dozens of unique enemies and environments. Using only a slingshot, can you fight your way to victory, when a single hit can kill you?

SKILL BASED PROGRESSION

There are no powerups or leveling systems. Progression is tied solely to your skill as a player. And in a world where most enemies die in a single hit, this means constantly adapting to new attack and movement patterns. From sandfish that leap out of the ground to snowballs that split apart when you hit them, each enemy offers a unique challenge.

BATTLE SINGULARITIES

Face enormous machines with ever shifting weak points and methods of attack. Each machine felled unlocks a new region to explore and new enemies to fight.

EXPLORE DIVERSE WORLDS

From sprawling cityscapes to desolate wastelands, discover dozens of unique environments spread across 7 regions. And with new side quests, mechanics, and enemies in each region, Akashic Slingshot offers a huge amount of content just waiting to be discovered.

EXPECT THE UNEXPECTED

The more you play, the more the world will change. Where do the limits of this game truly lie?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel 3rd Gen
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Later areas are more resource intensive, the game should be running at a stable 60+ fps in the earlier sections to ensure that the entire game can be played smoothly.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Fight your way through a diverse world in this action-adventure side scroller, where you are given one weapon and die in one hit. Can you earn the right to peer beyond the Zeroed Abyss?
